items.sentence: We\'ll probably arrive in Boston before 2:30.
We\'ll probably need to talk to someone else.
Tom couldn\'t believe it was over so quickly.
Tom didn\'t mention anything about the party.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary what needed to be done.
Tom drank the white wine Mary poured for him.
Did Tom tell you it would be hard to do that?
Did someone tell you that you could use this?
Did someone tell you that you had to do this?
Tom doesn\'t plan on going to Boston with us.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary does that very often.
Speaking a foreign language well isn\'t easy.
That camera is Tom\'s most prized possession.
It looks like Tom has gained a little weight.
Tom tried to do that, but he wasn\'t able to.
Tom will help you do that if you want him to.
Tom will never be able to do that by himself.
You\'re a little older than Tom, aren\'t you?
You\'re a native French speaker, aren\'t you?
Environmental problems call for quick action.
I want to be a police officer when I grow up.
I want to be notified the moment Tom arrives.
Tom has to do it even if he doesn\'t want to.
Tom hasn\'t been bitten by a rattlesnake yet.
Tom has climbed mountains all over the world.
We have to make sure people get back to work.
We have to start looking for a place to live.
We have too many things that need to be done.
Would you like me to take care of it for you?
Where did you go during your summer vacation?
Why did I fall in love with a woman like you?
Tom is afraid he might hurt Mary\'s feelings.
It seems unlikely that Tom committed suicide.
I\'ve always known this would happen someday.
In addition to French, Tom can speak English.
Is the grizzly the largest bear in the world?
I don\'t fight with Tom as much as I used to.
Tom and Mary go hiking together every summer.
Tom and Mary hardly ever speak to each other.
I haven\'t talked to Tom in a very long time.
I heard part of Tom and Mary\'s conversation.
I\'ll introduce you to Tom if you want me to.
I\'m not as good at playing tennis as Tom is.
I\'m not planning to meet Tom at the airport.
Tom closed his eyes and drifted off to sleep.
Tom killed himself on his thirtieth birthday.
Do you think Tom would be willing to help us?
Do you think Tom would care if Mary did that?
Do you think Tom would mind if Mary did that?
